result.title: solve_to_save
result.content:
include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int n , m , k , sz = 0;

signed main() {

ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);

cin >> n >> m >> k;

vector <int> a(n + n) , kt(k + 2) , in_w;
vector < vector <int> > df(k + 5);
set <int> w;
set <int> :: iterator it = w.begin();
vector <int> :: iterator iv = in_w.begin();

for (int i = 1 ; i <= n; i++) {
    cin >> a[i];
    if (w.size() != m) w.insert(a[i]);
    sz = max(sz , a[i]);
}

in_w.resize(sz * 10);

for (int i = 1 ; i <= k ; i++) cin >> kt[i];

for (int i = m + 1 ; i <= n + 1; i++) {
    for (int j = 1; j <= k ; ++j) {
        set <int> :: iterator cns = w.begin();
        advance(cns , kt[j] - 1); //check
        df[kt[j]].push_back(*(cns));s
    }
    cout << endl;
    set <int> :: iterator csi = w.begin();
    w.erase(*(csi));
    w.insert(a[i]);
}
cout << endl;

//for (int i = 0 ; i < k ; i++) cout << *(max_element(df[i].begin() , df[i].end())) << ' ';


return 0;

}
